Title: Heat 
Original title: Heat 
Director: Michael Mann 
Country: United States 
Year: 1995 
Release Date: 09/02/1996 
Length: 171 min. 
Genre: Crime, Drama, Thriller, Action 
Starring: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight, Tom Sizemore, Diane Venora, Amy Brenneman, Ashley Judd, Mykelti Williamson, Wes Studi 
Distributor: Kino Vision Society 
Studio: Warner Bros. Pictures, Regency Enterprises, Art Linson Productions, Forward Pass, Monarchy Enterprises BV 

Synopsis: 
Neil McCauley is a master thief, one of the best. His philosophy of life: life is not tied in to anything that you can not break off if things get hot. His band of criminals is a highly qualified group of professionals who come to impress even the detective Vincent Hanna. But Hannah, a man whose work is the center of his life, becomes obsessed with it, putting her relationship to the brink of disaster. As the band prepares the final blow McCauley and Hannah's team tries to avoid, both realize that they are facing the greatest minds to have faced
